text: 7:18 Jeremaia 44:17-19Men boriba dazibagh eghuva izima, afeziaba aviba arɨsi, ezɨ amebaba bisketba tuasa plaua gami, kar aser amizir kam, Astarten me a bagha ofa gami, me a dɨbora ghaze, Overiamɨn Garir Atrivir Amizim. Egha me uaghan aser igharagha gariba bagha wain isa me bagha ofa gami. Me kamaghɨn amua paza na damuasava ami.
